com.koverse.sdk.export

Class ExportFileFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koverse.sdk.sink.AbstractRecordIo
      • com.koverse.sdk.sink.AbstractRecordWriter
        • com.koverse.sdk.export.ExportFileFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordIo, RecordWriter, Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public abstract class ExportFileFormat
extends AbstractRecordWriter
    The abstract base class for an export file format. An export file format can export the records of a data set to one or more files on a files system.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ExportFileFormat.CompressionType
      What compression to use for the output file(s), if any.
